verbs.description: The French President and the German Chancellor [V: are] meeting Donald Trump this week and both will attempt to convince him not to renege on the 2015 accord .
[ARG0: The French President and the German Chancellor] are [V: meeting] [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: this week] and both will attempt to convince him not to renege on the 2015 accord .
The French President and the German Chancellor are meeting Donald Trump this week and both [V: will] attempt to convince him not to renege on the 2015 accord .
The French President and the German Chancellor are meeting Donald Trump this week and [ARG0: both] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: attempt] [ARG1: to convince him not to renege on the 2015 accord] .
The French President and the German Chancellor are meeting Donald Trump this week and [ARG0: both] will attempt to [V: convince] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: not to renege on the 2015 accord] .
The French President and the German Chancellor are meeting Donald Trump this week and both will attempt to convince [ARG0: him] [ARGM-NEG: not] to [V: renege] [ARG1: on the 2015 accord] .
